title: Episode 01: The Voice Engine
dc:creator: Todd Henry
description:
Learn to use the Voice Engine to make your ideas resonate.

More: Episode 01: The Voice Engine.
content:encoded:
In this episode of the Louder Than Words Bookcast, I introduce the concept of the Voice Engine, and the three core drivers that every resonant, compelling voice exhibits.

Each week I’m giving away a free copy of my 4 hour Udemy course to help you organize and unleash your best work every day. To participate, just leave a response to this week’s question in the comments below. We’ll choose one commenter each week to win the course.

This week’s question: Which of the three drivers of the Voice Engine do you think you need to work on the most?

More: Episode 01: The Voice Engine.
